text: Hani Shukrallah (; 1950 â€“ 5 May 2019) was an Egyptian journalist and political analyst. He was editor-in-chief of Al-Ahram Weekly between 1991 and 2005. He was later founder and editor-in-chief of Ahram Online. He also worked as a co- editor of Al-Shorouk. He wrote articles for Al-Hayat, The Guardian, Indian magazine Outlook and the Journal of Palestine Studies. He was born in Cairo. Shukrallah died on 5 May 2019, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Columnists Category:Writers from Cairo Category:Egyptian journalists
title: Hani Shukrallah
